definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: waste, lay waste (As. balâḳu, Pi. destroy, Lyon:Sargon 61; cf. Ar. bal=uwqah;un a desert)—

definitions.title: Po.
definitions.body: Pt. without [[מ]], sf. [[בּוֹלְקָהּ]] Is 24:1 (‖[[בּוֹקֵק]], subj. ´[[י]], obj. [[הארץ]]);—on form (which might also be Qal Pt.) cf. Ol:§ 254 Lag:GN 1882, 403; also [[בקק]] Po. Je 51:2, and intensive use of Inf. abs. Niph. Is 24:3; further Pu. (i.e. intens.) Pt. Na 2:11 (this however perhaps largely influenced by assonance).

definitions.title: Pu.
definitions.body: Pt. [[מְבֻלָּקָָה]] Na 2:11 (´[[בּוּקָה וּמְבוּקָה ומב]]), devastated, or as subst. a devastated city.
